nodes.text: The Zoa'mon were a sentient species. According to the play Evocar, which was written by the Hutt playwright Direus'Pei around the year 671 BBY, the Zoa'mon were driven to extinction by the Tionese warlord Xim. When Xim was captured and placed on trial by the Hutts, he justified the extinction of the Zoa'mon on the basis that they were slavers. Xim's conquests occurred approximately between 25,130 and 25,100 BBY.
The Zoa'mon were created by Michael Kogge for the fourth part of his article Xim Week: The Despotica, which was published as an exclusive article on StarWars.com Hyperspace in 2009.
